Text:
I just finished figuring out that OS 1.1.2 sucks butt and will constantly corrupt your save games.  You can downgrade to V1.1.0 if you have the 512MB DS-X.

It'll start up saying your Wi-Fi is corrupt, something else and finally show you a "New Game" and a game that seems to have a million hearts.  Delete it, restart, and everything should be good.  omg that took forever to figure out.

Here is the link : http://www.shunyweb.info/DS-X%20Downgrader...0by%20Shuny.rar

seems that if you get the "Saving EEPROM" message when you boot the DS-X, then Zelda will hang at a white screen.  Restart, you won't get "Saving EEPROM" and it'll start successfully then. DS-X firmware is lame. I'm selling mine, and my copy of Zelda, for an R4 and SD card. ;)
Thx. Will test this on a R4.
Anyone tried this on a M3 Simply?
OLD BOY it works good with M3 Simply..
